title: 687: MICHAEL SAYLOR PREDICTS BITCOIN WILL SKYROCKET TO $14 MILLION!! BTC NOW LEGAL TENDER IN EL SALVADOR!
description:
Bitcoin Gigachad Michael Saylor predicts hundreds of trillions of dollars in investments will flow into BTC which can push the Bitcoin as high as $14 million per coin.

Saylor ballparks that between $100T and $300T could seek a SOV in Bitcoin. If BTC were to reach the $300 trillion market cap Saylor outlines, that would bring each BTC to more than $14 million.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YouTube channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
